name: Falling Home
description:
The buddies cannot goes home alone, they are too big to move. The player control the wind and have to push the buddies to their houses.
It's an AR Game so it needs a specific target to be put on a table and use the game installed on a smartphone/tablet and target the marker with the device.
One button to blow the wind, one button to restart the level.

Credits:
Headax, vitakee (From Left to Right, Third person is from other team )
